sentences.sentence: Rauxa is reminiscent of our words "raucous" and "ruckus".
sentences.translation: 罗克斯让人想起我们的词“沙哑的”和“喧闹的”。

sentences.sentence: This caused such a ruckus all over Japan that they had to change their mind.
sentences.translation: 这在日本上下引起了不小的骚动，他们不得不因此改变主意。

sentences.sentence: Suddenly there was a bit of a 8 ruckus.
sentences.translation: 突然发生了一阵小骚动。
